title: Um..help?
body:
http://prntscr.com/dpak2b
Hi , i get this everytime I enter LoL , I played LoL yesterday and it wasn't like this , just packet loss during games..Any fix?

replies.body: The quality or strength of your connection seems to be dwindling rapidly, and now isn't just packet loss but an all out disconnect.  I recommend going over the steps found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network.  You should also test it out in custom games to prevent any penalties as well.  Let me know if you have any questions!
